name: Movie Search Web Application
desc: This is a Web Application where user can search for any Movie in the search page and get the details of it like IMDB rating, Release Year, Genre.
highlights: Used the Web Service REST API of the movie DB OMDB (The Movie Database).
User can sort the movies based on their ratings.

name: Outlook India
desc: Outlook India covers the latest India news, analysis, business news and long-form stories on culture, money market and personal finance. Read India's best online magazine.

name: EngageBay
desc: EngageBay is an integrated marketing, sales, support and CRM solution designed to help small to midsize enterprises acquire, engage and convert website visitors into customers.
highlights: A Group Project of 4 developers build the website in 5 days
User can maintain thier data by using website module service

name: Youtube - Clone
desc: YouTube is a free video sharing website that makes it easy to watch online videos. You can even create and upload your own videos to share with others. Originally created in 2005, YouTube is now one of the most popular sites on the Web, with visitors watching around 6 billion hours of video every month.
highlights: User can easilyy see the video in full screen also.
